system.effect: Deflect one ranged hit per scene
system.description: Absorption plates and kinetic ablation units are implanted in the user's arms and linked with a reactive ballistic calculator. Once per scene, as an Instant action, the user can deflect a successful ranged bullet, arrow, or thrown weapon attack, including burst or suppressive fire. Surprise attacks cannot be deflected this way, nor can melee attacks or explosives.
